name: Dice Tower (tavurth)
description:
Save yourself from endless waves of enemies by rolling the dice to determine which magic you can cast.

Gameplay: Collect dice from the arena and use them to roll for magic spells which are cast on your environment. How high a score can you get?

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left click - Shoot

Space - Roll dice (if you have collected)

Notes:

Unfortunately a lot of personal stuff came up this weekend otherwise I would have polished this more, I think I will do some more work on it tomorrow.
